cards.title: Sun
cards.text: The sun is a massive star providing light, heat, and energy essential for life on Earth.

cards.title: Forest
cards.text: A forest is a large area covered with trees and undergrowth, hosting diverse wildlife and ecosystems.

cards.title: Water
cards.text: Water is a vital, transparent, odorless, tasteless liquid essential for all forms of life and ecosystems.

cards.title: Tree
cards.text: A tree is a perennial plant with an elongated trunk, branches, and leaves, crucial for ecosystems and oxygen.

cards.title: Mountain
cards.text: Mountains, formed by tectonic activity, are vital for biodiversity. They influence climate and provide resources like minerals and timber.

cards.title: River
cards.text: Rivers, originating from mountains, are crucial for ecosystems, agriculture, and human use. They provide  support diverse aquatic life.

cards.title: Clouds
cards.text: Clouds, composed of water droplets or ice crystals suspended in the atmosphere, are visible masses of condensed water vapor.
